roleset.name: acronym for 'can't be arsed' (bothered)
roleset.note: CBA-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from cba.01-v)

example.name: the arg
example.text: I would 've liked a snow day back home but at uni I really cba tbh . Also I 'm in Bournemouth so it probably wo n't even happen at all lol .
